Scribble (Monol/???) (142)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): CD List: Monol: Scribble (Monol/???) (142)
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, August 13, 2000 - 04:25 pm:

Make a scribble (monol/???)by raising a monol's fame over 80 then dropping it (by competing in a low-level tourney) to under 65. When you return to the ranch, there will be graffitti on the monol and it will have transformed into a scribble.

This monster is not available from CD.

This monster is also used to make a Doodle.
